programmes.show_description: Reporter Bronagh Munro investigates why Omar Benguit has spent 23 years in prison for murder when there is no CCTV or forensic evidence linking him to the crime.

Watch the Birdie. Preston's stuck in a balloon, and only Mojo and Bo can get him back on the ground.
Mission New Pet. The Ducklings want a pet, but Weasy isn't keen on changing his comfortable life.

programmes.show_name: Grizzy and the Lemmings: World Tour
programmes.show_description: Programme on Demand. Grizzy confiscates the remote control device, but the Lemmings find another one.

programmes.show_name: Grizzy and the Lemmings: World Tour
programmes.show_description: Frosty Cup. Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into a race.

Giant, Apollo, Fury, Athena, Funny Farmers! Nitro, Legend and Freddie Fraser fool Apollo, Athena, Fury and Giant.

programmes.show_name: Blue Peter: Six the Musical and The Next Step
programmes.show_description: Six the Musical and The Next Step. The queens from Six the Musical perform a show-stopping song.
Train Hard, Race Easy. Twins Colby and Zane go head-to-head, and Theodore makes his comeback after a bad crash.

programmes.show_name: Songs Inspired by the Movies at the BBC
programmes.show_description: A collection of hits from the BBC archives that highlight how films and movie stars have always influenced the biggest singers, songwriters and bands.
A selection of some of the best BBC moments and classic archive performances from those singers and bands who cracked Hollywood as well as the pop charts.

programmes.show_name: Movie Themes at the BBC: Volume 2
programmes.show_description: Some more of the greatest movie themes to light up the UK pop charts from the BBC's archives, including Lulu's To Sir with Love, Kate Bush's This Woman's Work and Lisa Loeb's Stay.
Performances of Bond theme tunes from the BBC archive, featuring Tina Turner, Dame Shirley Bassey, Matt Monro, Fun Lovin' Criminals, Adele, Sheena Easton, Garbage and a-ha.

Datshiane Navanayagam and Hamza Yassin visit Milford Haven, 30 years on from the Sea Empress oil spill, to meet those who led the emergency response and to learn how the area has recovered.
Highlights from five Premier League games, including Manchester City against Newcastle United. Elsewhere, Aston Villa host Leeds, Burnley travel to Chelsea and Brentford take on Brighton.

Archaeologist Ben Robinson reveals the story of this Devon coastal gem's transformation from fishing village to romantic Victorian seaside resort.
